alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 14 at 12:36AM MST until August 14 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Arizona, including the following area, Central La Paz. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST this morning through this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow moving scattered thunderstorms will elevate the flood risk Sunday afternoon and evening. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood The Flood Watch for early this morning is cancelled for a portion of southwest Arizona, including the following area, Central La Paz. Flooding is no longer expected to pose a threat. Please continue to heed remaining road closures.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
